name: Wastelanders
description:
When you kill an enemy, you will always swap to their weapon.

Fight your way through the treacherous demolition derby of the wasteland racetracks of future Australia. Compete against many different and deadly cars and switch to their weapons or watch other battles unfold as the other contestants try their best to win. Get the best high score you can by killing as many other contestants as possible and try not to die in this unforgiving sport.

Made in roughly 24 hours across 8 days for Miz Jam 1 using the Kenney 1-Bit Pack art kit.
